## DocumentResource.getPage() method

Retrieves a specific document page. The page is retrieved as a .png image file.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPage(packageId: string, documentId: string, pageIndex: number): Promise<Responses.Response>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packageId | string | Package ID |
|  documentId | string | Document ID |
|  pageIndex | number | Page index in the document |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Responses.Response&gt;

PNG image data of the specified document page

## Remarks

- [REST API documentation (OneSpan)](https://community.onespan.com/products/onespan-sign/sandbox#/Documents/api.packages._packageId.documents._documentId.pages._index.get)
